main event: A witness observed a white cigar-shaped object with red lights traveling from the north to the south horizon over Cleveland, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was reported to ascend and then descend during the observation period., The object was believed to be traveling at a very high rate of speed, much faster than conventional aircraft., A middle-aged housewife was the main witness and had never seen anything like it., The object had no visible means of propulsion and made no sound., The sighting lasted for approximately 4 minutes.
sighted object: white cigar-shaped object with red lights
